sentences.english: The mochi-making assembly is an annual tradition of the Yamaguchi-gumi.
sentences.chinese: 捣麻糬大会是山口组每年的惯例。

sentences.english: Mochi is a traditional food for the Japanese New Year.
sentences.chinese: 蔴糬是日本新年的传统食物。

definition: rice cake (typically made with glutinous rice flour and steamed)
(Hakka cuisine) snacks made from glutinous rice flour (rice cakes, noodles etc)
pineapple cake, traditional Taiwanese sweet pastry
round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)
popular Taiwan snack, similar to a hamburger, steamed bun stuffed with pork, pickled vegetables, peanut powder and cilantro
variant of 羹[geng1], used in restaurants and night markets in Taiwan
suncake (small round cake made with flaky pastry and a maltose filling, originally from Taichung, Taiwan)
rice cake dumpling/sticky rice cake/mochi cake
